parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server</value></part><part><name/>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Allow curator use of given addon. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> curatorObj '''addCuratorAddons''' addons </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> curatorObj: [[Object]] - Curator module.  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>  

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> addons: [[Array]] of CfgPatches classes  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>  

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>curatorObj [[addCuratorAddons]] ["A3_Armor_F_AMV","A3_Armor_F_Panther"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>curatorObj [[addCuratorAddons]] ["A3_Modules_F_Curator_Lightning"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Addons can be stacked:<code>curatorObj [[addCuratorAddons]] ["A3_Armor_F_AMV","A3_Armor_F_Panther"];
curatorObj [[addCuratorAddons]] ["A3_Modules_F_Curator_Lightning"];
[[diag_log]] [[curatorAddons]] curatorObj;</code>
<br>
<code>[
	"A3_Armor_F_AMV",
	"A3_Armor_F_Panther",
	"A3_Modules_F_Curator_Lightning"
]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Curator]], [[removeCuratorAddons]], [[removeAllCuratorAddons]], [[curatorAddons]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> mp</name>=<value> Can be executed only on server </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
